title: How to Get Lugia in Pokémon Silver

steps.title: Obtain the first seven badges.
steps.content: Obtain the first seven badges. To obtain the gym badges, you must defeat the gym leader for each badge.

steps.title: Get the Silver Wing.
steps.content: Get the Silver Wing. You get it after defeating Team Rocket at the Goldenrod Tower.

steps.title: Go to Whirlpool Islands.
steps.content: Go to Whirlpool Islands. Use your town map to find it.

steps.title: Go through the Whirlpool Islands.
steps.content: Go through the Whirlpool Islands. At this point, you'll need a Pokémon with Flash.

steps.title: Find the elderly man at the end of the dungeon.
steps.content: Find the elderly man at the end of the dungeon. Then, go down the stairs.

steps.title: Lugia should be in the cavern below.
steps.content: Lugia should be in the cavern below. Save your game so that you don't lose progress, and prepare for the battle.

steps.title: Once you are ready, walk up to Lugia and press A to talk to it.
steps.content: Once you are ready, walk up to Lugia and press A to talk to it. It'll let out a battle cry, and you start the battle. Do not use your Master Ball.
